description: A list of the instance types that Amazon EMR supports. You can filter the list by Amazon Web Services Region and Amazon EMR release.

parameters.name: ReleaseLabel
parameters.description: The Amazon EMR release label determines the versions of open-source application packages that Amazon EMR has installed on the cluster. Release labels are in the format emr-x.x.x, where x.x.x is an Amazon EMR release number such as emr-6.10.0. For more information about Amazon EMR releases and their included application versions and features, see the Amazon EMR Release Guide .

nested_items.name: SupportedInstanceTypes
nested_items.description: The list of instance types that the release specified in ListSupportedInstanceTypesInput$ReleaseLabel supports, filtered by Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 instance type, for example m5.xlarge, of the SupportedInstanceType.

nested_items.name: MemoryGB
nested_items.description: The amount of memory that is available to Amazon EMR from the SupportedInstanceType. The kernel and hypervisor software consume some memory, so this value might be lower than the overall memory for the instance type.

nested_items.name: StorageGB
nested_items.description: StorageGB represents the storage capacity of the SupportedInstanceType. This value is 0 for Amazon EBS-only instance types.

nested_items.name: VCPU
nested_items.description: The number of vCPUs available for the SupportedInstanceType.

nested_items.name: Is64BitsOnly
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the SupportedInstanceType only supports 64-bit architecture.

nested_items.name: InstanceFamilyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 family and generation for the SupportedInstanceType.

nested_items.name: EbsOptimizedAvailable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the SupportedInstanceType supports Amazon EBS optimization.

nested_items.name: EbsOptimizedByDefault
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the SupportedInstanceType uses Amazon EBS optimization by default.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDisks
nested_items.description: Number of disks for the SupportedInstanceType. This value is 0 for Amazon EBS-only instance types.

nested_items.name: EbsStorageOnly
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the SupportedInstanceType only supports Amazon EBS.

nested_items.name: Architecture
nested_items.description: The CPU architecture, for example X86_64 or AARCH64.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: The pagination token that marks the next set of results to retrieve.
